values:
It appears as though this problem will not solve itself, though I am vaguely sure that most of these "clones" should have died by now, if not merely by merit of their own seemingly inherent stupidity, than by the frustrations of those they crowd.

I suggest that the Captains and Vice Captains still in full control of their sanity not only carry their swords unrestrained, but also take offensive action against the 'imposters'.

If nothing else, engaging them in combat would give us a better idea of what kind of enemies we're up against.. <strike>and relieve stress</strike>

I don't know why Hitsugaya-taichou keeps such comfortable couches in his office if he doesn't want me to fall asleep during work. I can't help it if they're more inviting than stacks of dull paperwork!

But on a different tangent, I've been noticing some strange goings-on. Oh no, nothing gets by me. Anyone else encounter a rather deranged-looking Kira-san and his rabid offerings of Mushrooms? Maybe I just keep having strange dreams?

Speaking of which, has anyone seen Hitsugaya-taichou?

Aaah. *stretches legs* Smells like a fresh, new Journal.

(: Mmm. I'm such a layout whore.

Anyway! Here's my IC Matsumoto character Journal for the LiveJournal community roleplay <lj user="omg_bleach">. Seriously, I would NOT OBJECT if someone were to dish out some NICE MATSUMOTO ICONS.

HINT, HINT.

Dx plz.
